select taskDtl.id id, taskDtl.task_id taskId, taskDtl.product_id productId, taskDtl.warehouse_genre warehouseGenre, CASE WHEN taskDtl.warehouse_genre = 'entity' THEN '实体库' WHEN taskDtl.warehouse_genre = 'virtual' THEN '虚拟库' ELSE null END warehouseGenreName,
round(taskDtl.receive_count, 2) receiveCount,
round(taskDtl.apply_count, 2) applyCount, taskDtl.retreat_type retreatType, CASE WHEN taskDtl.retreat_type = '1' THEN '退还仓库' WHEN taskDtl.retreat_type = '2' THEN '退还虚拟库' ELSE null END retreatTypeName,
round(taskDtl.retreat_count, 2) retreatCount, taskDtl.out_dtl_id outDtlId, round(taskDtl.out_count, 2) outCount,
taskDtl.in_dtl_id inDtlId, round(taskDtl.in_count, 2) inCount, taskDtl.warehouse_id warehouseId, taskDtl.cuser cuser, taskDtl.cdate cdate,
taskDtl.uuser uuser, taskDtl.udate udate, taskDtl.remark remark, taskDtl.isdisable isdisable,
product.code productCode, product.name productName, product.spec productSpec, product.genre productGenre, genre.name productGenreName, unit.name productUnitName,
round(ifnull(product.lock_count, 0), 2) lockCount, round(ifnull(product.stock_count, 0), 2) stockCount, round((ifnull(product.stock_count, 0) - ifnull(product.lock_count, 0)), 2) productStockCount,
outDtl.state outDtlState, CASE WHEN outDtl.state = '0' THEN '待派单' WHEN outDtl.state = '1' THEN '执行中' WHEN outDtl.state = '2' THEN '已完成' WHEN outDtl.state = '-1' THEN '已取消' ELSE null END outDtlStateName,
inDtl.state inDtlState, CASE WHEN inDtl.state = '0' THEN '待派单' WHEN inDtl.state = '1' THEN '执行中' WHEN inDtl.state = '2' THEN '已完成' WHEN inDtl.state = '-1' THEN '已取消' ELSE null END inDtlStateName,
CASE WHEN outDtl.state = '0' THEN '(出库)待派单' WHEN outDtl.state = '1' THEN '(出库)执行中' WHEN outDtl.state = '2' THEN '(出库)已完成' WHEN outDtl.state = '-1' THEN '(出库)已取消'
WHEN inDtl.state = '0' THEN '(入库)待派单' WHEN inDtl.state = '1' THEN '(入库)执行中' WHEN inDtl.state = '2' THEN '(入库)已完成' WHEN inDtl.state = '-1' THEN '(入库)已取消' ELSE null END inOutDtlStateName

left join vmes_warehouse_out_detail outDtl on taskDtl.out_dtl_id = outDtl.id left join vmes_warehouse_in_detail inDtl on taskDtl.in_dtl_id = inDtl.id
and taskDtl.task_id = #{taskId}
and ${queryStr}
order by ${orderStr}
